casebody.data:
M-I, LLC, petitioner,
v.
Sarmad SYED. No. 16-1524. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 13, 2017. Motion of Consumer Data Industry Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied. Justice ALITO took no part in the consideration or decision of these motions and this petition.
